name: Uprooted (traaaaaaain)
description:
Controls

WASD or Arrow Keys - move

Spacebar - uproot

Credits / Programs used

All art assets by me

Pixel art - Aseprite

Engine - Unity

Notes

This prototype was made for Weekly Game Jam - Week 166, Theme: 'Roots'

My first game jam - this game is super buggy and incomplete but I had fun nevertheless :) 

I did not implement a score function even though there's a visual :v

ok have fun
